请求失败示例
流式请求成功示例

ChatCompletions.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: hunyuan.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ChatCompletions
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TopP": 0,
    "Stream": false,
    "Temperature": 0,
    "Model": "hunyuan-pro",
    "Messages": [
        {
            "Role": "user",
            "Content": "你好呀！"
        }
    ]
}
ChatCompletions.title: 非流式请求成功示例
